attributes.action: Introduce a ban on all media advertising of alcohol
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Alcohol is proven on all levels to be as problematic, on a personal and social level, as all the other class A drugs which are criminalised. For this reason, I do not call for an outright ban, in accordance, but an immediate halt on all media advertising of alcohol to the public.

For the people who are trying to heed the recent herald by the press as to the inherent dangers of home drinking, to have an alcohol advert, with all it's associated 'cool' stereotypes, stuffed in your face regularly during the most popular programming. Quite frankly, I feel that it is a complete disgrace that our government is accepting, and thereby condoning,such harmful propoganda.
